item.title: Writing reference
item.description: Writing reference Each memo must be composed of the elements detailed below. You must follow this structure when writing your memos. Title Write a short declarative sentence to highlight the key change. 140 characters maximum. Use the name of the service as the subject. Write in the present tense. Prefer active phrasings over passive (e.g., “Microsoft expands reach” rather than “Reach expanded by Microsoft“). Describe the policy change, not the name of the document.
